perks_page_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this page?
perks_page_unsaved_confirm: You have unsaved changes to your page. Do you want to save?
perks_page_mass_delete_off: Switch on delete mode to quickly remove pages
perks_page_mass_delete_disabled: Delete mode can be enabled when custom pages have been created
perks_select_sub_style_description: Select two runes from your secondary path
perks_select_no_sub_style_description: Select your secondary path above to choose runes
perks_show_long_descriptions: Show detailed descriptions during comparison (or hold SHIFT)
perks_perk_does_not_exist: The selected rune does not exist.
perks_perk_disabled: The selected rune has been disabled.
perks_perk_in_wrong_slot: The selected rune has been moved to a different slot.
perks_multiple_selections_in_slot: The selected rune's slot has multiple selections.
perks_perk_selected_multiple_times: The selected rune has been selected multiple times.
perks_invalid_data: An error occurred parsing rune data
perks_enable_grid_mode: Turn on Grid Mode for all pages
perks_tutorial_create_new_page_body: You can manage your runes here. Presets can be hidden with the checkbox. Obtain additional pages through the store.
perks_tutorial_path_overview_body: Each rune page requires a selection of a primary and a secondary path. Each path represents a different play style. Your secondary path offers a subset of runes to complement your primary.
perks_tutorial_preset_pages_body: Runes offer your champion special powers and stats that enhance your gameplay. Try out the preset builds or customize your own.
perks_tutorial_primary_path_body: Runes provide a range of enhancements to your champion. Each primary path has unique Keystone runes which grant powerful effects. Select one rune to fill each slot. You can change the page's view type at the bottom.
perks_tutorial_secondary_path_body: Choose a secondary Path for your page. The Path determines the runes you can choose from. Just like in the primary Path, you can only have 1 rune from a row.
perks_tutorial_stat_mods_body: Rune stats allow you to personalize your champion's starting stats. You can tailor these to fit your gameplay needs.
perks_create_from_default_page: Preset pages are locked. Would you like to create a custom page with these options?
perks_page_adding_disabled: Inventory full. Delete or obtain more pages to create more.
perks_page_adding_disabled_level: You can create new pages at level {{level}}.
perks_copy_default_page_inventory_full: Cannot create new custom page from preset options because inventory is full. Please delete a page and try again.
perks_copy_default_page_locked: Cannot create custom page from preset options because custom pages are not yet unlocked. Level up to create custom pages.
8_4_rune_swap_and_notify_message: The Resolve path has been changed. Custom pages using invalid runes have been adjusted. No action is required but you may want to review your pages.
generic_rune_swap_and_notify_message: Runes have changed since your last login. Custom pages using invalid runes have been adjusted. No action is required but you may want to review your pages.
rune_recommender_disabled_no_champion_se: Please select or lock in a champion to view.
